ingredients: 1 cup of uncooked long grain rice
1 14.5 oz can of diced tomatoes, drained
1 15oz can of black beans, drained and rinsed
2 cups of colby jack, monterey jack or cheddar cheese
1 cup corn kernels, frozen or canned
½ cup sweet peas, frozen or canned (optional)
1 red bell pepper, cored, seeded and diced
½ cup canned black beans, drained and rinsed
1 (14 ounce) can fire-roasted diced tomatoes, undrained
2¼ cups of low sodium chicken broth
1 teaspoons of chili powder, or to taste
¼ teaspoon of cayenne pepper, or to taste
Salt and black pepper to taste
Salt and black pepper to taste
1 cup (or more as desired) of shredded colby-jack or cheddar cheese
